sentence.Network_en: Yesterday, we saw the cloture of the Medicare Modernization Act.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天，我们看到医疗现代化法案的讨论终结。

sentence.Network_en: To apply cloture to ( a parliamentary debate ).
sentence.Network_cn: 结束辩论而付诸表决采用终结辩论以表决的方法结束 ( 国会辩论 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: 讨论-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 不再讨论 to drop 讨论终结 cloture 讨论终结 gagging.
...惟因共和党阻挡，26日法案未能进入最后表决阶段的「辩论终结(Cloture)」程序；根据参院议事规则，为避免法案陷入冗长的「议事 …
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... clot 凝块；v.使凝结成块 cloture 辩论的终结 cloudburst 大暴雨，豪雨.
终止辩论（cloture）是法文中「完结」的意思，除了cloture，也有地区用closure或guillotine。最早在议会设立终止辩论规例的国家是 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French clôture, from Old French closure (see closure)

means.word_mean: 1. a rule for limiting or ending debate in a deliberative body
1. terminate debate by calling for a vote;
